summary: Springtide is a performance ENB that offers the great look of an ENB, while being light on your system.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/41281005-1514078094.png[/img]
Springtide Performance ENB offers the same great look of some of the best ENBs, while being light on your system.

Springtide, like the name suggests, is an ENB preset with warm saturated spring colors, light shadows, and ethereal lighting

There are two different settings included with the file, Springtide Matte and Springtide Shiny.Â 

Springtide Matte
-Low Specurality, no shiny skin or metal
Springtide Shiny
-High Specurality, very shiny skin and metal

(screenshots taken with Springtide Shiny)
_____________________________________________________

Springtide will cause an approximate 10 fps drop

Active effects:
-EnableLens
-EnableAdaptation
-EnableAmbientOcclusion
-EnableSunRays
-EnableSunGlare
-EnableWater
-EnableCloudShadows
-EnableVolumetricRays
-EnableProceduralSun


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/41281005-1514078259.png[/img]
simply copy the contents of whichever preset you want, and paste them into your Skyrim directory.
REQUIRES the latest ENB files from enbdev


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/41281005-1514078293.png[/img]
Mods used in screenshots:
-Noble Skyrim textures
-Veydosebrom grass
-ELFX (enhanced lights and effects)
-Realistic Water two (with ENB textures)
author: Umbra Manum
